metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

Initialize_Flow_Environment_variable.description: Environment location specific Flow URL - remember / at the end

parameters.$filter: admin_pvadeleted ne true and admin_pvaisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_PVAOwner/admin_makerisorphaned ne true
admin_rpadeleted ne true and admin_rpaisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_RPAOwner/admin_makerisorphaned ne true
admin_connectordeleted ne true and admin_appisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_Maker/admin_makerisorphaned ne true and admin_iscustomapi eq true
admin_businessprocessflowdeleted ne true and admin_businessprocessflowisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_BusinessProcessFlowOwner/admin_makerisorphaned ne true
admin_aideleted ne true and admin_aiisorphaned eq true and admin_AiCreator/admin_makerisorphaned ne true
admin_portalisophaned eq true and admin_PortalOwner/admin_makerisorphaned eq false
admin_environmentdeleted ne true and admin_environmentisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_Maker/admin_makerisorphaned ne true
admin_flowdeleted ne true and cr5d5_flowisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_DerivedOwner/admin_makerisorphaned ne true
admin_appdeleted ne true and cr5d5_appisorphaned ne 'No' and admin_AppOwner/admin_makerisorphaned ne true

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date

parameters.$filter: ((_admin_flowcreator_value eq @{items('Apply_to_each_maker')?['admin_makerid']} and _admin_derivedowner_value eq null) or _admin_derivedowner_value eq @{items('Apply_to_each_maker')?['admin_makerid']}) and cr5d5_flowisorphaned ne 'Yes'

catch_-_not_allowed_to_query_photo.inputs: catch - not allowed to query photo

Removed.inputs: updated by the Get Maker Call so not needed here. will delete this after we get feedback that there were not exceptions to this
